meta.description: CSH language labels for database table tx_aigallery_galleries

languageKey.label: The way you want to specify images
Set to "automatic" if you want to load images from a fileadmin folder automatically, or "manual" if you want to select them manually.
title of the gallery
The descriptive title of the gallery.
Short description of the gallery contents.
Acts like a summary when the user flicks through all your galleries to get an idea what he can expect.
Manual collection of images you want to display
Select the images you want to display from the fileadmin manually.
Load images from folder
Loads all images inside the fileadmin folder automatically. Useful if you want to display a great amount of images.
Live Update the images from the folder
If set, the output in the frontend will change automatically if you add images to the folder AND clear the cache. If disabled, you have to save the gallery again to enable the images.
alt attributes of the images
alt attributes of the image tags that will be created. Separate with enter.
title attributes of the images
title attributes of the image tags that will be created. Separate with enter.
Description for images
Short description for each image. Can be displayed in the frontend beneath each image. Separate with enter.
Images to display per page
Determines the paging size of the gallery. Enables you to specify the amount of images per page per gallery, overriding the default that is set in the plugin.
